S.FORM: == Mknahuy == u sulit nu Hulam: 拿互伊部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Mknahuy. u kasalumaluma' nu Mknahuy sa, 115 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 321 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 248 ku tademaw, pakalatu 77%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 73 ku tademaw, pakalatu 23%. u kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 74%, Pangcha(Amis) 2%, zumazuma 1%. u Tayan a niyazu' u Tayan a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Tayan a tademaw itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Pangcah, u Yuwatan, u Taluku, inayi' tu ku zuma a cidakay itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. izaw ku malecaday a ngangan nu Sakizaya atu Tayan. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052

== Mknahoy == o solit no Holam: 拿互伊部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hsincho a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Mknahoy. o kasalomaloma' no Mknahoy sa, 115 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 321 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 248 ko tademaw, pakalato 77%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 73 ko tademaw, pakalato 23%. o kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 74%, Pangcha(Amis) 2%, zomazoma 1%. o Tayan a niyazo' o Tayan a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Tayan a tademaw itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Pangcah, o Yowatan, o Taloko, inayi' to ko zoma a cidakay itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. izaw ko malecaday a ngangan no Sakizaya ato Tayan. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052
